1.verse: UPawulos, umbanjwa kaKristu Yesu, noTimoti umzalwana,  babhalela uFilemon oyintanda, osebenzisana nathi,

2.verse: noApiya isithandanekazi sethu, noArkipo umphumi-mkhosi nathi, nebandla elisendlwini yakho;

3.verse: bathi, Makube lubabalo kuni, noxolo oluvela kuThixo uBawo,  neNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu.

4.verse: Ndihlala ndibulela kuye uThixo wam, ndikukhumbula emithandazweni yam,

5.verse: ndiluva nje olwakho uthando, nokholo onalo kuyo iNkosi uYesu, nakubo bonke abangcwele,

6.verse: ukuze ubudlelane bokholo lwakho bube nokusebenza ngokwazi konke okulungileyo okukuni, kuse kuKristu Yesu.

7.verse: Kuba sinovuyo nothuthuzeleko olukhulu ngalo uthando lwakho,  ngokuba izibilini zabangcwele ziphunyuziwe ngawe, mzalwana.

8.verse: Kungoko endithi, nakuba ndinako ukungafihlisi okukhulu kuKristu, kokuba ndikuthethele okufanelekileyo,

9.verse: noko ngenxa yothando ndisuka kanye ndikubongoze,  ndingonjengoPawulos ixhego, ngoku ke ndikwangumbanjwa kaYesu Kristu.

10.verse: Ndikubongoza ngenxa yomntwana wam, uOnesimo, endimzeleyo ndisezintanjeni;

11.verse: obefudula engeluncedo lwanto kuwe, kodwa ngoku kuwe nakum unoncedo oluhle.

12.verse: Lowo ndimbuyisele kuwe; wena ke mamkele, oko kukuthi,  yamkela izibilini zam;

13.verse: ebendinga mna ndingasendihlala naye apha, ukuze athi endaweni yakho andilungiselele, ndisezintanjeni ngenxa yeendaba ezilungileyo ezi;

14.verse: kodwa andithandanga kwenza nto, ungatshongo wena, ukuze ukulunga kwakho kungangi kokokunyanzelwa, kube kokokuvuma.

15.verse: Kuba mhlawumbi wahlukaniswa umzuzwana nawe ngenxa yoku,  ukuze umzuze ngokwaphakade;

16.verse: engasenjengekhoboka, esuke wangaphezu kwekhoboka,  engumzalwana oyintanda, ngokukodwa kum; kubeke phi na ke kuwe,  ngokwenyama nangokweNkosi?

17.verse: Ngoko ke, ukuba unobudlelane nam, mamkele njengam.

18.verse: Ukuba wakona, nokuba unetyala kuwe, oko kubalele kum.

19.verse: Mna Pawulos ndikubhale ngesam isandla ukuthi, mna ndokuhlawula; endingatshoyo kuwe ukuthi, kum unetyala elingaphezulu, elinguwe ngokwakho.

20.verse: Ewe, mzalwana, mandincedeke ngawe mna ngokwaseNkosini;  ziphumze izibilini zam ngokwaseNkosini.

21.verse: Ndikubhalele ndeyisekile kukundilulamela kwakho, ndisazi ukuba uya kwenza nangaphezulu koko ndikuthethayo.

22.verse: Kunye ke noko, ndilungisele indawo yokuhlala; kuba ndithembile ukuba ngayo imithandazo yenu nondiphiwa.

23.verse: Uyakubulisa uEpafras, umbanjwa ndawonye nam wakwaKristu Yesu,

24.verse: kwanoMarko, noAristarko, noDemasi, noLuka, abasebenzisana nam.

25.verse: Ubabalo lweNkosi yethu uYesu Kristu malube nomoya wenu.  Amen.
